Home Components API

API Reference

Properties Events CSS Custom Properties Slots

Properties

Name Type Default Description
variant string 'default' Visual style variant of the component (default, primary, secondary)
disabled boolean false Whether the component is disabled

Events

Name Detail Type Description
my-event { value: string } Fired when the component value changes

CSS Custom Properties

Name Default Description
--primary-color #4f46e5 Primary color used for borders and accents
--background-color #ffffff Background color of the component

Slots

Name Description
default Default slot for component content
icon Optional slot for adding an icon
